content.p: The Diplomas in Spanish DELE are official qualifications certifying the degree of competence and mastery of Spanish, granted by Instituto Cervantes on behalf of the Ministry of Education and Professional Training of Spain. The DELE Diplomas will be considered the official qualifications to acknowledge Spanish language competence for any professional or academic activity which requires an appropriate level of competence. Furthermore, they are complementary certifications to the programmes of statutory education in foreign languages in many countries and institutions, and they are also instrumental in aiding personal promotion in all academic areas and professional spheres. The DELE examinations have been designed following the guidelines of the Common European Framework of Reference for Languages (CEFR) of the Council of Europe. More information (only in Spanish) You can face DELE exams feeling better prepared and much more confident with some short courses offered by the University of Nottingham Malaysia. The contents of these courses focus on becoming familiar and offer a chance to practise every different kinds of exercises candidates can come across in the exam. There will not be any grammatical or lexical material covered in these courses. They are free of charge and will take place in May 2021.
